issue.title: [Java] Apply new hash map in DictionaryEncoder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5834](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5834). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up of [ARROW-5814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5814).

Apply new hash map in DictionaryEncoder to make it work.
